thread.section_title: Euroflorist Belgique / België Beoordelingen | Beoordelingen van Euroflorist Belgique / België | www.euroflorist.be
thread.title: Marc Devroye
thread.title_full: Euroflorist Belgique / België Beoordeeld door Marc Devroye

author: Marc Devroye
title: Marc Devroye
text:
roses for Valentine's day were delivered timely, ok for that.
the initial outlook seemed roughly acceptable.
but after 1 day already the roses seemed over the top of their freshness, and despite the care given to them to keep them looking well, after the 2nd day they were "gone", completely lousy looking opened and ready for the dustbin !! what a disappointment for a type of flower that when delivered fresh can keep easily about 10-12 days.
we will surely not recommend Euroflorist for future orders.
